author: Saphora Smith
title: Britain in crisis: Queen delivers rare rallying cry as prime minister sent to hospital
description: “We will be with our friends again; we will be with our families again; we will meet again,” the queen said, echoing a World War II-era song.
content:
LONDON It was a rare speech designed to reassure a nation struggling under the weight of a pandemic.
Better days will return, Queen Elizabeth II said, echoing the beloved World War II-era song Well Meet Again that offered hope to many on the front lines. We … [+3549 chars]
